page.title: 06TRADE - Co-op Homemaker
page.content: TRADE We entered the Co-op and went through the automatic doors. The security guard kept walking away from our group but we managed to catch up with him. He told us the manager wasn't there so we talked to the assistant manager instead. His name was Mr. Goldspink. The office was behind the shop. They started planning Home-maker 7 years ago. They built it because they thought it necessary. There is no more going to be built. Special Saturday student staff are employed. He employs about 250 staff and there are more women than men. There is a special security department. After closing time they employ staff to fill the shelves. The annual turnover is 15 million pounds. The starting salary is Â£50 - Â£55 a week for new staff.
